unnormalised: Hmm, konnem tor ek perfect Indian lagnachem planning vixim vicharlem? Tem ek marathon zavn asa, sprint nhoi, khas korun auspicious timings dhyanan gheun. Poilem, pandit sadharanponnan zolmache charts polloun shubh mahurat tharaitat, tem auspicious date ani time. 14/01 (Makar Sankranti) vo festivals bhaxen dates borem starting points zaunk xaktat, punn tumka Pandit ji-chi approval nischit rupan zai poddta. Ani, tumka venues ani vendors-chi availability-i vicharant gheunchi poddta, tum peak season bhonvton planning kortat zalear Oct-Nov (Diwali time) bhaxen.
normalised: Tor, konnem ekdem boro Bharatiya lognachi iojna korche vixim vicharlem? Tem ek marathon, sprint nhoi, khas korun jevha tumi shubh vel daktat. Poile, pandit sadharanpan zolmachi kundli daktat shubh mahurat tharaupak, mhonnje shubh tarik ani vell. Chaudhary janer ani utsovacho dis favo zavunk xakta, punn tumkam Pandit ji-chi manyatai zai. Toxench, tumkam zago ani dukan daktat jevha tumkam utsvacho dis mhonnche oktober november (divliche vell) asli.
text: Hmm, konnem tor ek perfect Indian lagnachem planning vixim vicharlem? Tem ek marathon zavn asa, sprint nhoi, khas korun auspicious timings dhyanan gheun. Poilem, pandit sadharanponnan zolmache charts polloun shubh mahurat tharaitat, tem auspicious date ani time. 14/01 (Makar Sankranti) vo festivals bhaxen dates borem starting points zaunk xaktat, punn tumka Pandit ji-chi approval nischit rupan zai poddta. Ani, tumka venues ani vendors-chi availability-i vicharant gheunchi poddta, tum peak season bhonvton planning kortat zalear Oct-Nov (Diwali time) bhaxen.

unnormalised: Ani fuddlea lognachya ritincho vichar korat. Haldi, Mehendi, ani Sangeet sarkhya vostu sadharanponn 1-3 dis poilim lognachya tarikheche adhi ghoddtat. Shaadi, dharun ghe, 20/12-ak asa, zalear tumkam 17/12 thavn sogllem toyar korchem poddttolem. Toxench, ghorchea mon'xamvangdda velanchi khatri korunk yad dovrat kiteak kaim somarombh sokallim chodd veglim asunk xaktat, jem 4:00 vaztam kaim poojank lagun. Xharache bhairchea soireank vell lagta to visronakat ani addinchya velacho aspav korunk yad dovrat – Bharoti promannit vell chodd korun vostavik patrakarvelanthavn +/- 2 voram astha!
normalised: Ani magir lagna adle ritiriwazanchem lek dhoryat. Haldi, Mehendi, ani Sangeet sarkhele karyakram sadharanponnanim lagna tarikhe adim ek te tin dis zata. Zori shaadi, dharun ghea, visavem Decemberak asa, tor tumkam satravem December thaun sogllem toyar korchem poddttolem. Ani, ghorchea lokam sangata timings nischit korunk visrum naka karan kaim karyakram sokallim vegim zatat, chyar shunya shunya A-M kaim poojankhatir. Ganvambhailchea soireankhatir proxonnacho vell dhoryat ani vadhik vell ghalunk visrum naka – Bharoti proxonnacho samanyo vell vaakodekhere dha te don voram fattim-fudem asta!
text: Ani fuddlea lognachya ritincho vichar korat. Haldi, Mehendi, ani Sangeet sarkhya vostu sadharanponn 1-3 dis poilim lognachya tarikheche adhi ghoddtat. Shaadi, dharun ghe, 20/12-ak asa, zalear tumkam 17/12 thavn sogllem toyar korchem poddttolem. Toxench, ghorchea mon'xamvangdda velanchi khatri korunk yad dovrat kiteak kaim somarombh sokallim chodd veglim asunk xaktat, jem 4:00 vaztam kaim poojank lagun. Xharache bhairchea soireank vell lagta to visronakat ani addinchya velacho aspav korunk yad dovrat – Bharoti promannit vell chodd korun vostavik patrakarvelanthavn +/- 2 voram astha!

unnormalised: Ani nimánnem, sambhavit dhil'lank toyar ravā. Tem ek Bhāratiy lognachā! Dhil'l prāyogik ritīn ek paramparā āsa. Vādhavel vel mhātvecho āsa. Tech bhāber velpatrakā spashṭ rupān sampark karā. Jar barāt sokāḷī 11:00 vāgtā pãuchpacho asa, tar kutumbāk mhaiti asa ki ratikāḷī 12:00 vāgtā pãuchem sãgātik manlāri cholta! Divsache disan, sãgātle lokānk khabar thevcheāchē ani ajun dhākhal karcheachē khatir apps vā sãdeāche spreadshits vaprā. Shubhechhā!
normalised: Nimánem, sambhavit usrák toyar ravat. Tem ek Bhartiy lagin asaa! Usrá mhanlear ek paramparaach. Vadhik vell asop gorjechem. Tech porim, vellachim niyallan spasht rokhchem. Zori baraat sokallim eleven zero zero A-M porian yevpacho asat, tor ghorchea lokank zannavachem ki bara zero zero P-M merenui velar aasa mhunnon mantat! Divasbhar soglleank mahiti divonk ani update korunk apps vo shared spreadsheets vaprat. Tumkam Devan borem korum!
text: Ani nimánnem, sambhavit dhil'lank toyar ravā. Tem ek Bhāratiy lognachā! Dhil'l prāyogik ritīn ek paramparā āsa. Vādhavel vel mhātvecho āsa. Tech bhāber velpatrakā spashṭ rupān sampark karā. Jar barāt sokāḷī 11:00 vāgtā pãuchpacho asa, tar kutumbāk mhaiti asa ki ratikāḷī 12:00 vāgtā pãuchem sãgātik manlāri cholta! Divsache disan, sãgātle lokānk khabar thevcheāchē ani ajun dhākhal karcheachē khatir apps vā sãdeāche spreadshits vaprā. Shubhechhā!
